NEYVELI INFO
WELCOME TO POWER CITY

In 1935, the presence of black particles was discovered and the analysis led to the discovery of lignite reserves beneath the areas in and around neyveli village.The neyveli lignite corporation was formed as a corporate body in 1956 by the government of india and the mining of lignite started in 1962!!!!!!

neyveli proudly invites you to the pride of nation.
THE RAILWAY HAS BEEN SET UP BY BRITISH IN 1968
